name: Leif Hedstrom
biography: Leif Hedstrom is a software engineer at Yahoo!, where he has designed and implemented several edge services actively used by many large sites, such as Y! News and Flickr. Lately he has pushed for Open Sourcing the HTTP proxy server used internally at Yahoo!, and since the fall of 2009, the Traffic Server project is now in the incubator stage with the Apache Software Foundation. Prior to Yahoo!, Leif has worked at several internet companies such as Netscape Communications and Infoseek Corporation.
